Top-3 Similar Questions: au_750099: Opening new terminal from terminal and navigating directories (Permission denied?)
Top-3 Scripts:
au_750099: # first change to the directory where your executable lies (make sure you have permissions on tha directory)

cd /BESTFULLPATH 

# then run your new terminal

gnome-terminal --profile=YOURPROFILENAMEHERE --working-directory=/PATHAGAIN -e ./WHATYOUWANTTORUN

Explanations about Options.--working-directory: Set the terminal's working directory to DIRNAME.
Explanations about Options.-e: Execute the argument to this option inside the terminal.
